sections.title: APPENDIX E : ANSWER KEY TEMPLATES FOR TST1 SAMPLE TEXT S
paragraphs: This appendix contains the answer key templates corresponding to the texts i n section 1 of appendix D (see appendix A for the template fill and forma t specifications) . Section 2 of appendix D contains texts that were irrelevant to the dat a extraction task ; the answer key for each of them would contain the message ID in slo t 0 and an asterisk in each of the remaining slots . 0 .
